players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I've identified Diana as the mafioso. I'll continue to gather evidence and work with Bob to uncover more information."
Diana: "I'm the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Charlie; he seems suspicious."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
